original_text: So he went and hired himself out to one of the citizens of that country, who sent him into his fields to feed pigs.
korean_text: 가서 그 나라 백성 중 한 사람에게 붙여 사니 그가 그를 들로 보내어 돼지를 치게 하였는데

sentences.original_text: to one of the citizens of that country
sentences.korean_translation: 그 나라 주민 중 한 사람에게

sentences.original_text: who sent him into his fields
